features: Shea Moisture African Black Soap clarifying skin toner acts as a dual action astringent that removes impurities that create an imbalance on the skin's surface; use as an acne toner or face spray.
For problem skin, Shea Moisture has designed this simple toner, cleansing water and facial mist to be an aid that helps address specific skin problems associated with acne.
Also made with Witch Hazel, Oat and Tea Tree Oil, this face toner for oily skin, acne toner and facial spray provide powerful deep cleansing for pores.
Our skin toner, hydrating face mist and acne toner with astringent is simple to use and also provides just enough exfoliation to slough away dead skin cells.
After using our African Black Soap as cleansing water for skin, use this toner and skin toner for face to effectively manage oil and shine without clogging pores.
body.description: Shea Moisture African Black Soap clarifying skin toner acts as a dual action astringent that removes impurities that create an imbalance on the skin's surface; use as an acne toner or face spray. For problem skin, Shea Moisture has designed this toner, cleansing water and facial mist to be an aid that helps address specific skin problems associated with acne. Also made with Witch Hazel, Oat and Tea Tree Oil, this simple face toner for oily skin, acne toner and facial spray provide powerful deep cleansing for pores. Our skin toner, hydrating face mist and acne toner with astringent also provides just enough exfoliation to slough away dead skin cells. After using our African Black Soap as cleansing water for skin, use this toner and skin toner for face to effectively manage oil and shine without clogging pores. Saturate a cotton ball or pad with face toner or acne toner. Wipe skin toner on cleansed face and neck or spray on face mist and wipe in upward motions. This hydrating face mist, acne toner and toner by Shea Moisture has no sulfates, no parabens, no phthalates, no propylene glycol, no mineral oil, no animal testing and no petroleum. We are also pioneering fair trade through Community Commerce at home and abroad. We strive to be sulfate free, paraben free and more, whenever possible. Tested on our family for four generations. Never on animals. Our Story: Sofi Tucker started selling Shea Nuts at the village market in Bonthe, Sierra Leone in 1912. By age 19, the widowed mother of four was selling Shea Butter, African Black Soap and her homemade hair and skin preparations all over the countryside. Sofi Tucker was our Grandmother and SheaMoisture is her legacy. With this purchase you help empower disadvantaged women to realize a brighter, healthier future.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: African Black Soap Problem Skin Toner SheaMoisture's African Black Soap Problem Skin Toner acts as a dual action astringent that removes impurities caused by bacteria and other factors that create an imbalance on the skin's surface. As an important part of our SheaMoisture skincare line featuring African black soap, we've designed this toner to be an aid that helps address specific skin problems associated with acne. Witch Hazel and Tea Tree Oil provide powerful deep cleansing for pores and Oat provides just enough exfoliation to slough away dead skin cells.

After using our African Black Soap for skin, use this toner to effectively manage oil and shine without clogging pores. And because it contains rich certified organic Shea Butter and Shea Oil, it has moisturizing properties that control shine without drying out skin, creating a clean, matte finish. Made with natural and certified organic ingredients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works in lieu of the face wash I've never been happier
reviews.reviewText: Buy it! Buy the face wash too even the black face bar soap.. I've struggled with adult acne and I'm poor with the Shea facewash and toner and gelee moisturizer my face minus hormonal break outs has never looked better

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite Toner for (extremely) sensitive/oily skin!
reviews.reviewText: I have very sensitive skin and only use hypo-allergenic products, perfume-free, and oil-free. I'm more on the oily side so the tea tree oil really helps control that and helps with preventing breakouts! I noticed almost instantly how different my skin looked, it appeared smoother and more even-tone. Shea Moisture has a lot of great products, however the African soap line is best suited for people with acne prone skin. They do have a charcoal version instead of tea tree oil, which did NOT work for me. Charcoal reacts different with my skin, but that doesn't mean it won't for you. Overall i'm extremely happy as I was able to find a toner decently priced and that works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not an expert on toner - but I like it
reviews.reviewText: I am not familiar with toner or how it works so I am not sure what I am supposed to expect from the product. I do know the benefits of black soap and tea tree oil and I purchased the facial wash/scrub that is a part of this product line and I really like that product. I have no complaints about this products thickness, consistency, scent or any other aspect. My face feels nice and clean and I like the look of my skin after I use the facial scrub and the toner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Broken spray but excellent product
reviews.reviewText: The product itself is fine but I’m pretty disappointed that the sprayer came broken. I’m not sure how since the clear cap was on and it didn’t look smashed or anything, but it will not spray. I’ll pay a few bucks more in store for it next time to make sure it isn’t broken. Maybe should come with a different top than a sprayer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it.
reviews.reviewText: I've used this product for many years and now that they have discontinued it in the stores I came here for it. I don't know what has happened but this product made my face break out so bad. It seems way more strong and as soon as I sprayed it my face started to burn a little. I won't be ordering this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars such a big help
reviews.reviewText: I love this toner! I have smart skin, so I must change products every couple months, just so my skin doesn't catch onto me trying to help it from turning into a deplorable mess. This toner does a great job of controlling the oils in my skin, without drying it out. I think it is somewhat magical. It is pleasant, non-irritating, and generally very good for someone with combination skin who is also a dermatologists worst nightmare. Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product for acne-proned skin.
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this product for years.It balances my skin, and is a great pre-wash spray to get pores extra clean. I’ve battled acne for 30+ years, and I have found that this product really helps minimize/heal breakouts. Sugar and starches are a major cause of acne (gut), not necessarily poor hygiene. Your skin is a reflection of what’s going on inside your body. Pay attention to that. Food allergies? I do recommend washing your face once a day, but spray this on clean skin, and five minutes before you wash (gentle natural cleaner.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 9, 2018
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Product feels nice on skin after use and you feel clean. You need to also maintain a good cleansing routine of moisturising and hydration.
